title: Site Access Restrictions
description: Clarification on construction hours and site access limitations during school hours
assumptions: Construction work permitted Monday-Friday 7:00 AM to 3:00 PM
No heavy equipment operation during class hours
Emergency vehicle access must be maintained at all times

title: Material Staging Area
description: Available space for material staging and temporary storage
assumptions: East parking lot available for material staging
Covered storage required for weather-sensitive materials
resolution: Approved staging area as outlined in assumptions

title: Utility Connections
description: Existing utility locations and connection requirements
assumptions: Electrical service entrance located on north wall
Water main connection at street level
Natural gas service available at property line
Telecommunications infrastructure to be coordinated with campus IT

title: Environmental Considerations
description: Environmental protection measures and permit requirements
assumptions: Erosion control measures per state regulations
